DamageResistances: Bludgeoning, Slashing and Piercing from non-magical weapons, Psychic, Radiant

Traits.Name: Camouflage
Traits.Content: The House Hippo has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks when in natural environments or inside homes.

Traits.Name: Evasive Nature
Traits.Content: The House Hippo can move through the space of any creature that is larger than it, and it can escape being grappled by using a bonus action.

Actions.Name: Nibbly Bite
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +3 to hit, dealing 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage. This attack has a chance to distract the target, imposing disadvantage on their next attack roll if they can't succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw.

Actions.Name: Dusty Dash
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +3 to hit, dealing 5 (1d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage as the House Hippo scurries past, giving it advantage on its next Stealth check. If the target is larger than the House Hippo, they must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone due to the sudden dash.
